stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Jacksonville, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Jacksonville are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Florida law caps single-payment payday loans at $500 with a maximum fee of 10% of the loan amount. For installment loans, the cap is $1,000 with fees limited to 8% of the outstanding balance on a biweekly basis.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Jacksonville must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

faq.question: Where is your Jacksonville cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Jacksonville branch is located at 2156 San Marco Avenue, Suite 180, in the historic San Marco neighborhood. We're easily accessible from I-95 Exit 344, near the Cummer Museum and Jacksonville Zoo.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Jacksonville location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins are always welcome!

faq.question: Is Jacksonville's location convenient for Riverside and Avondale residents?
faq.answer: Yes! We're right in that area near San Marco. The Riverside Avondale neighborhood is very close to our location, making it convenient for residents of those historic areas.

faq.question: What if I'm late paying my Jacksonville cash advance?
faq.answer: Don't worry - Florida law provides protections. If you can't pay on time, inform your lender IN PERSON before the due date. You're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling at no additional charge.

faq.question: Can I verify that Lion Cash Advance is licensed in Jacksonville?
faq.answer: Yes! You can verify our license status anytime by visiting flofr.gov/education/verify-a-license or calling the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687. We are fully licensed and compliant with all Florida regulations.
